create.tasks: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS tasks (task_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL, description VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, time_of_creating timestamp DEFAULT CLOCK_TIMESTAMP());
create.comments: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS comments (com_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, comment VARCHAR(1000) NOT NULL, time_of_creating timestamp DEFAULT CLOCK_TIMESTAMP(), task_id INT NOT NULL REFERENCES tasks(task_id));
